Array: Press <button="Interact"> to <color=magic>cast</color>. Casting is always at full power.
While airborne, <color=magic>steer</color> the bobber with <button="Player_MoveHorizontal"> and press <button="Interact"> to <color=magic>kick</color> it into the water.
If the bobber touches water close to a fish, it's a <color=magic>hook</color>!
While hooked, <color=magic>steer</color> the fish with <button="Player_MoveHorizontal"> and press and hold <button="Interact"> to <color=magic>reel while it is in the zone</color>.
Be careful not to reel outside of the zone, otherwise the line will <color=bad>break</color>.
Reel the fish all the way to the dock and it's a <color=magic>catch</color>!
